mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: pt’aring sami miru la, myup pkba’an myan psba biru, kmayan pgleng myan maha “tuli! tubun tunux!”
It’s time for class , the teacher walked into the classroom, and the monitor said: “Stand up! Salute!”
我今天七點到學校。: 上課了，老師走進教室，班長說:「起立!敬禮!」

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: hmnyang sami maha “lokah su pcba biru.”
We said loudly, “Hi, teacher.”
我今天七點到學校。: 我們大聲的說:「老師好。」

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: mkbaga sami ga, cba’an sami ni pcba biru sa lmpu.
In class, the teacher taught us the Tayal language of numbers.
我今天七點到學校。: 上課的時候，老師教我們數字的族語。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: kbalung sami pcba biru lmpu, m’uwas sami uwas na lmpu.
We followed the teacher to read, we sang the number song.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們跟著老師唸，我們唱了數字歌。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: pyux kay na S’uli Tayan ba’un mu la.
I have learned many Tayal languages.
我今天七點到學校。: 我學會好多族語。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: musa kung miru krryax, kbaga kung kay na S’uli Tayan krryax skayan mu ki yaya mu mung.
I go to school every day, I learn the Tayal language every day, and I want to tell my mother.
我今天七點到學校。: 我天天上學，我天天學族語，我要講給媽媽聽。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: lalu mu ga Amuy Pihaw.
My name is Amuy Pihaw.
我今天七點到學校。: 我的名字是Amuy Pihaw。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: lalu ni yaba mu ga Pihaw Bawxin.
My dad’s name is Pihaw Bawxin.
我今天七點到學校。: 我爸爸的名字是Pihaw Bawxin。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: lalu ni yaya mu ga Pitay Tuyaw.
My mother’s name is Pitay Tuyaw.
我今天七點到學校。: 我媽媽的名字是Pitay Tuyaw。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: mpuw kayan mu misu la.
I am 10 years old.
我今天七點到學校。: 我今年10歲。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: kyan utux bsuyan mu tmalung, lalu nya ga Tahus Pihaw, mpuw utux kayan nya la.
I have a brother, his name is kulas, he is 11 years old.
我今天七點到學校。: 我有一個哥哥，他叫Tahus Pihaw，他今年11歲。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: niya sami mgluw miru sku utux pkba’an biru.
We study in the same school.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們在同一間學校讀書。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: kuzing ru bsuyan mu tmalung Tahus ga sgalan myan m’uwas.
Both my brother and I like to sing.
我今天七點到學校。: 我和哥哥都喜歡唱歌。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: smogan kung mlngya, ryax hngi’an mutu sami mgluw musa mlngya utux sali.
I like swimming. During the holidays, our whole family go swimming together.
我今天七點到學校。: 我喜歡游泳，放假的時候，我們全家會一起去游泳。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: smogan kung mkbba sa g’anus rawin ba sami mgluw m’uwas ru mlngya.
I love meeting new people, we can sing and swim together.
我今天七點到學校。: 我喜歡認識新朋友，我們可以一起唱歌和游泳。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: kuzing ga la’i na Atayan.
I am an Atayal child.
我今天七點到學校。: 我是泰雅族的小孩。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: niya mki syaw Lyung Penux sali myan.
Our family lives by the Da’an River.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們家住在大安溪旁。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: magan hi kwara sali myan.
There are five people in our family.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們家共有五個人。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: tugan hi ku mntsway myan.
There are three brothers and sisters in our family.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們家有三個兄弟姊妹。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: mgluw sami myanux ki yaba yaya bsuyan tmalung ru bsuyan knerin.
I live with my father, mother, brother and sister.
我今天七點到學校。: 我跟爸爸、媽媽、哥哥和姊姊住在一起。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: bawi balay yaba mu yaba mu ga kinsat.
My father is tall and he is a policeman.
我今天七點到學校。: 我的爸爸很高，我的爸爸是警察。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: mhikang balay yaya mu yaya mu ga kuysang.
My mother is thin and my mom is a doctor.
我今天七點到學校。: 我的媽媽很瘦，我的媽媽是醫生。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: mki sali mutu sami kyalun kay tayan ni yaba.
My father speaks the Atayal language with us at home.
我今天七點到學校。: 爸爸在家會和我們說族語。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: mhngi ’bagan ga mutu sami musa alang.
We will all go back to the tribe during the summer vacation.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們暑假都會回部落。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: bsuyan mu tmalung ru knerin ki kuzing mgluw sami kmyap takay.
My brothers and sisters and I will catch frogs together.
我今天七點到學校。: 我和兄姊會一起抓青蛙。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: sgalan mu balay utux sali myan.
I like our family very much.
我今天七點到學校。: 我很喜歡我們家的人。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: sami ki yaya mnwah mgnaw tanux soni.
I went out with my mother today.
我今天七點到學校。: 今天我和媽媽出去玩。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: memaw mslingaw ku babaw kayan sku slwan, ini kskinut ru ini kkilux ku kayan, memaw blay sinbehuyan nya.
The sky is blue during the day, the weather is neither cold nor hot, and the wind is cool.
我今天七點到學校。: 白天的天空很藍，天氣不冷也不熱，風很涼爽。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: tl’ung sami babaw be’nux k’man mani sa pang, mb’ya sku hi kinmli na witux, memaw yemli.
We ate bread on the grass, the sun was shining on us, and it was very warm.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們在草地上吃著麵包，陽光灑在身上，非常溫暖。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: babw kinryax lga mtanah ku kayan la.
In the afternoon, the sky turned red.
我今天七點到學校。: 下午，天空變紅了。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: p’usan mu yaya, huwa ka mtanah kayan la.
I asked my mother why the sky is red.
我今天七點到學校。: 我問媽媽，為甚麼天空是紅色的。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: kmayan yaya maha kyala mmwah rhuyan la.
Mom said, maybe the typhoon is coming.
我今天七點到學校。: 媽媽說，可能是颱風要來了。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: gbyan lga ungat yulung mki babaw kayan mhtu ku yangah la.
There were no clouds in the sky at night, and the stars came out.
我今天七點到學校。: 晚上天上沒有雲，星星出來了。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: mmosa sami sali uziy la.
We were going home too.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們也要回家了。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: mki tu’iy na ’binah sali ga, kyalun mu ku yangah.
On the way home, I made a wish with the stars,
我今天七點到學校。: 在回家的路上，我跟星星許願。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: mwani laxiy ’wah rhuyan, smogan kung musa mgnaw tanux na.
I hope the typhoon doesn't come, I still want to go out to play again.
我今天七點到學校。: 希望颱風不要來，我還想再出去玩。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: niya mki syaw sali myan ku pkba’an biru myan, hmakay kung musa miru krryax, hmakay uziy mwah sali.
My school is next to our house, I walk to school every day, and I also walk home.
我今天七點到學校。: 我的學校在我們家旁邊，我天天走路去學校，也走路回家。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: ini krahu pkba’an biru myan, ini khbayaw mkbaga biru, mkbba sami kwara.
Our school is not big, there are not many students, everyone knows each other.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們學校不大，沒有很多學生，大家互相認識。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: kwara lla’i mutu sami mlahuy sku pgnahan, mgluw mnaw mari, mpcisan.
All the children will gather in the playground, play ball and chat together.
我今天七點到學校。: 所有小朋友會聚在操場，一起玩球、一起聊天。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: mgluw sami mgnaw uziy pcba biru, wiwan utux rahu na sali ku pkba’an biru.
The teachers also play with us, the school is one big family.
我今天七點到學校。: 老師們也會和我們一起玩，學校是個大家庭。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: siki kmagaw sami krryax, kwagan myan ru ini k’uraw ku pbrwan myan la.
We have to clean every day, and everyone has to clean the classroom.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們每天都要打掃，大家要把教室打掃乾淨。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: kruma ga mi’ing riwan na nyaway kruma ga kmagaw rhyan.
Some people clean the windows, some sweep the floor.
我今天七點到學校。: 有些人去擦窗戶，有些人去掃地。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: mutu myan kwagan kwara ana inu ’ung na pkba’an biru, psugun myan ku yaw myan ru pkrraw sami, ini k’uraw balay krryax ku pkba’an myan biru.
We will also clean every corner of the school. Everyone works together, and the school is very clean every day.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們還會打掃學校的各個角落，大家分工合作，學校每天都很乾淨。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: shisa mnwah kung alang mtayux yutas.
Yesterday, I went to visit my grandpa in the tribe.
我今天七點到學校。: 昨天，我去部落拜訪爺爺。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: bsya sami ini pktayux la snun mu balay hiya.
We haven’t seen each other for a long time and I miss him a lot.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們很久沒有見面了，我很想念他。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: txan kung ni yutas lga pkni’an kung nya bahat pnuban kung nya ocya.
As soon as grandpa saw me, he invited me to eat watermelon and drink tea.
我今天七點到學校。: 爺爺一看到我，就請我吃西瓜，請我喝茶。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: sbing balay bahat pinuhi ni yutas blay balay ni’un.
The watermelon grown by grandpa is very sweet and really delicious.
我今天七點到學校。: 爺爺種的西瓜很甜，真的很好吃。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: sgalan mu uziy ocya ni yutas blay nubun uziy.
I also like grandpa’s tea, it’s tasted good too.
我今天七點到學校。: 我也喜歡爺爺的茶，也很好喝。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: ’lyan lga kuzing ki yaki mgluw phapuy kryaxun.
At noon, I cooked lunch with my grandma.
我今天七點到學校。: 中午的時候，我和奶奶一起煮午餐。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: pyux tnahuk ni yaki syux wilung abang ru tmang.
Grandma cooked a big lunch, including fish, chicken, pumpkin, and snails.
我今天七點到學校。: 奶奶煮了很豐盛的午餐，有魚、有雞、有南瓜、還有蝸牛。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: babaw kinryax lga musa sami pinhyan yasay kmyut tbihi.
After lunch, we went to the vegetable garden to pick vegetables.
我今天七點到學校。: 吃完午餐後，我們去菜園摘菜。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: mnagan pyux ngahi sehuy ru inu tayan ku yaki sbay kung nya maha aras sali.
Grandma brought me a lot of sweet potatoes, taro and buckwheat, and asked me to take them home.
我今天七點到學校。: 奶奶拿了很多地瓜、芋頭和蕗蕎給我，要我帶回家。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: sgayan mu laha ru kyalun mu maha babaw ryax halan mu tayux laha.
I said goodbye to them and said I’d see them next time.
我今天七點到學校。: 我跟他們道別，說下次再去看他們。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: rasun sami ni pcba biru musa klhangan lmlalu sin’anan soni mbku sami blihun nya mbaziy kipu.
Today the teacher took us to the zoo, and we lined up at the gate to buy tickets.
我今天七點到學校。: 今天老師帶我們去動物園，我們在門口排隊買票。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: myup sami sahuy yengayan lmlamu sin’anan lga kmayan pcba biru maha te gleng ga kkbhni te suruw ga m’u usa tayux nanak simu.
After entering the zoo, the teacher said, There are birds in the front and snakes in the back
我今天七點到學校。: so you can visit them yourself.""
https://web.klokah.tw/text/sound/34285/5: 進入動物園後，老師說:「前面是鳥類，後面是蛇類，大家自己參觀。」

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: mngungu kung m’u nanu ye’asa ini kung usa tayux m’u.
I'm afraid of snakes, so I don't look at snakes.
我今天七點到學校。: 我會怕蛇，所以我不看蛇類。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: txan mu pyux kkbhni niya plaka babaw khoni txan mu uziy puk ki m’abi bling khoni.
I saw a lot of birds flying around in the trees and saw owls sleeping in tree hollows.
我今天七點到學校。: 我看到了很多鳥，他們在樹上飛來飛去，還有看到貓頭鷹在樹洞裡睡覺。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: kyan zo uma klit mki klhangan sin’anan ’yat mu kintxan kwara ’sinu hani txan mu soni m’as balay inlungan mu.
There are elephants, horses and tigers in the zoo. I have never seen these animals before. I was really happy to see them today.
我今天七點到學校。: 動物園裡有大象、馬和老虎，我從前沒有看過這些動物，今天看到了真的很開心。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: pyux pinsyasing mu spkita mu yaba yaya.
I took a lot of pictures and showed them to my parents.
我今天七點到學校。: 我拍了很多照片，給爸爸媽媽看。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: babaw nya pgluw sami ki yaba yaya muwah.
Next time I will come with my parents.
我今天七點到學校。: 下次要跟爸爸媽媽一起來。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: hngi’an ryax wayan hani ga bsuyan mu knerin ru kung mnwah sami Bnka tayux mama.
This holiday, my sister and I went to Taipei to visit my uncle.
我今天七點到學校。: 這個假日，我和姊姊去台北拜訪叔叔。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: t’aring sami Tuyuhara mluw kisya musa Bnka.
We took the train from Fengyuan to Taipei.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們從豐原搭火車去臺北。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: tehuk sami Bnka lga mniray haya ru muwah n_gan kisya mlmuh sami ku mama.
When we arrived in Taipei, my uncle drove to the station to pick us up.
我今天七點到學校。: 到了台北，叔叔開車來車站接我們。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: ini ktwahi ku hnari n_gan kisya ru sali na mama miray haya ini kbsya tehuk la.
The station is not far from my uncle’s house, and it’s just a short drive away.
我今天七點到學校。: 車站離叔叔家沒有很遠，開車一下子就到了。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: llingay sali ni mama ga kyan utux rahu na kklhangan kating mit mgluw sami miray ling ling aya musa kya.
There is a big ranch near my uncle’s house, and we rode bicycles to the ranch together.
我今天七點到學校。: 叔叔家附近有個很大的牧場，我們一起騎腳踏車到牧場。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: mki sami klhangan mit kating lga rasun sami ni mama musa sma’an mit ru mluw uma.
In the ranch, my uncle took us to feed the sheep and ride horses.
我今天七點到學校。: 在牧場，叔叔帶我們餵羊和騎馬。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: gbyan lga mgluw sami musa heci kgabi.
In the evening, we went to the city to have dinner together.
我今天七點到學校。: 晚上，我們一起去市區吃飯。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: pyux haya traku mki heci nanu ye’asa ku miray sami otobay musa kya.
There are a lot of cars in the city, so we go there by motorcycle.
我今天七點到學校。: 市區車子很多，所以我們騎摩托車去那裡。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: pshri sami lga txan ga wayan kri’un otobay la ’si sami gluw bas mshri.
When we were about to leave, we found that the motorcycle had been stolen, so we had to leave by bus.
我今天七點到學校。: 要離開的時候，發現摩托車被偷了，我們只好搭公車離開。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: misu soni niya sami mbinah Tuyuhara ba’aw ta wayan luwan ni mama ku otobay nya la.
Now that we are back in Fengyuan, I don’t know if my uncle’s motorcycle has been found.
我今天七點到學校。: 現在我們回到豐原了，不知道叔叔的摩托車找到了沒有。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: trang la’i kung na ga mki Mekarang sali myan, miru kung lga musa sami myanux Cikuto la, ’si sami kyanux heci la.
When we were young, our family lived in Mekarang. After I started school, we moved to Zhudong and have been living in the city ever since.
我今天七點到學校。: 小時候我們家住在梅花，上學以後，就搬到了竹東，一直在都市裡生活。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: miru kung rahu bbrwan lga, minkbaga kung utux pkba’an gaga na Gyenzyumin, ba’un mu ku pyux lmlamu ru blay gaga na Gyenzyumin Zok.
After I went to college, I took a course on aboriginal culture and learned that the aboriginal people in Taiwan have various and rich cultures.
我今天七點到學校。: 上了大學以後，我修了一堂關於原住民文化的課程，瞭解到臺灣原住民族有各式各樣豐富的文化。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: nanu ye’asa, mhngi ’ruyux ’bagan hani ga, bsuyan mu tmalung ru kuzing, mnwah sami alang ma’ut nnbkis, nki myan ba’un gaga myan nanak.
So this summer, my brother and I went back to our tribe to visit the elderly, hoping to understand the culture of our own ethnic group.
我今天七點到學校。: 因此，今年暑假時，我和哥哥回到部落訪問老人家，想要瞭解自己族群的文化。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: mspat pgan kayan ku nbkis la, ana ga txan ’si ga nisan mziman kayan na.
The old man is already eighty years old, but he still looks like a middle-aged man.
我今天七點到學校。: 老人家已經八十歲了，但是看起來還像才剛滿五十歲的中年人。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: p’usan mu hiya nenanu kay ba’un nya, pyang yuci ku knayan nya kay Tayan, ba uziy kmayan kay na Ngayngay ru kay Gipun.
I asked him which languages he knew, and he was fluent in Atayal, as well as Hakka and Japanese.
我今天七點到學校。: 我問他會哪些語言，他的泰雅語說得很流利，也會說客家話和日本話。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: p’usan mu hiya lga ba’un mu, aw ba sa mniru sku kay Gipun knerin nya, ga tayan mtyaw ga, ba’un nya hbayaw Ngayngay, nanu ye’asa ku pyux kay ba’un nya.
I asked him to find out that he learned Japanese when he was a child, his wife is an Atayal, and he knows many Hakkas at work, so he can speak so many languages.
我今天七點到學校。: 我問他才知道，原來他小時候就學日本話，太太是泰雅族人，而他工作上認識許多客家人，所以他會說這麼多語言。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: trang mppa’ut ru mpcisan sami ga, pyux knayan nku nbkis, yaw ru kinba’an na ’mlyap.
During our interview, the old man talked about a lot of traditional knowledge about hunting.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們訪談的時候，老人家談論了許多關於狩獵的傳統知識。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: ana myan ini thyaziy mung kwara, si kila, wayan myan syun sku soci, musa myan nble’un mung lozi.
Although we could’t fully understand it, we could record it on our cell phones and listen to it more.
我今天七點到學校。: 雖然我們沒有辦法完全聽懂，但是我們有用手機錄影，可以再仔細聆聽。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: la’i kung na ga ini mu ba’iy gaga nanak, sksayux mu cikay kuzing ga Gyenzyumin.
When I was young, I didn’t understand the culture of my ethnic group, and I was a little embarrassed that I was an aborigine.
我今天七點到學校。: 小時候我不瞭解自己族群的文化，對於自己是原住民有點不好意思。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: pyux ba’un lga, llungun mu kuzing ga Atayan, minnanak balay, kahun inlungan mu p’asun mu balay uziy la.
The more I know, the more I feel that being a Atayan is unique and something to be proud of.
我今天七點到學校。: 瞭解愈多以後，愈覺得自己身為賽夏族人，是很獨特的，也很值得驕傲。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: gbyan kisa mmwah sali ku sway tmalaung la.
My younger brother is going home this evening.
我今天七點到學校。: 今天傍晚，弟弟就要回家了。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: yaki ru kung musa sami bnasan yasay mbaziy wilung mnama tmahuk blay ni’un na kgbyun nku sway tmalung.
My grandma and I went to the market to buy chickens and prepared a delicious dinner for my younger brother.
我今天七點到學校。: 我和奶奶去菜攤買雞，預備給弟弟煮豐盛的晚餐。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: hminas sami sku bnasan tbihi pyux ku memaw mtasi na tbihi.
We passed the vegetable stand, which had a lot of fresh green vegetables.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們經過了菜攤，菜攤有好多新鮮的青菜。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: mbaziy sami sa kungsincay saku ru tanah sopu.
We bought water spinach, yams and carrots.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們買了空心菜、山藥和胡蘿蔔。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: kmayan ku syaw ka bnasan bebuway na lawpan maha phngaran ru zimuh mu ga pyang ssbing baziy cikay.
The owner of the nearby fruit stand said: “My pineapples and peaches are very sweet. Buy some!”
我今天七點到學校。: 旁邊水果攤的老闆說:「我的鳳梨和桃子很甜。買一些吧!」

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: minnaziy sami pngaran ru zimux.
We bought pineapples and peaches.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們買了鳳梨和桃子。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: hminas sami bnasan hi wilung kmayan Lawpan nanu bnasun su wilung soni ga rahu ru msyam utux wilung ga cyugan kbhun.
We passed the meat stall, and the boss said, “What do you want to buy? Today’s chickens are big and fat, and one is 300 NTD.”
我今天七點到學校。: 我們經過了肉攤，老闆說:「你要買什麼?今天的雞又大又肥，一隻300元。」

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: lokah s’yung la ma yaki p’usan nya Lawpan blay khuyun cikay.
Grandma thought it was too expensive and asked the boss if it could be cheaper.
我今天七點到學校。: 奶奶覺得太貴了，問老闆可不可以便宜一點。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: ana ga kmayan Lawpan rema mhnuk la ’yat thyayun khuy la.
But the boss said that it is already very cheap and cannot be reduced any further.
我今天七點到學校。: 但老闆說已經很便宜，不能再減了。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: mki bih ku lawpan kmayan maha uwah baziy syux mu syux mu ga rahu ru mhnuk.
The boss next door said, come and buy my fish, my fish is big and cheap.
我今天七點到學校。: 隔壁的老闆說，來買我的魚，我的魚又大又便宜。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: te pucing mbaziy sami wilung ru syux uziy muwah sami sali tmnahuk sami utux lalan rami.
In the end we bought chicken and fish, and went home to cook a table of food.
我今天七點到學校。: 最後我們買了雞也買了魚，回家煮了一桌子的菜。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: bsya sami mnaga gbyan la.
After waiting for a long time, it was already dark.
我今天七點到學校。: 等了好久，天已經黑了。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: niyan reng_wa ni sway mu tmalung maha si tbah ini swayan mhngi ku hitay siki rayx babaw rehay thuyay muwah sali la.
The younger brother called back and said that the army suddenly couldn’t take a vacation and would not be back until the next Sunday.
我今天七點到學校。: 弟弟打電話回來說，軍隊突然不能放假了，要下一個禮拜日才回來。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: kmayan yaki pyux pinhapuy ta kayan kwara muwah mgluw mani!
Grandma said that she has cooked so much, so let’s eat together!
我今天七點到學校。: 奶奶說已經煮了這麼多，叫大家一起來吃吧!

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: tpihun myan kwara gegluw ru rerawin muwah mlaw sa memaw blay na kgbyun.
We invited friends and family to have a great dinner together.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們邀請了親朋好友，一起來享用豐盛的晚餐。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: kyan utux rawin mu, lalu nya ga Hayang, mutu mngya maras ye’aya krryax.
I have a classmate named Hayung, he often forgets to bring things.
我今天七點到學校。: 我有一個同學叫Hayung，他常常忘記帶東西。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: miru sami lga, mutu mkura sku mtna mkbaga biru ksyuk sa inpit, i’ing, ini ga rban.
During class, he borrowed pencils, erasers or notebooks from his classmates.
我今天七點到學校。: 上課的時候，他跟同學借鉛筆、橡皮擦或是筆記本。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: minxaliy, minsazing, mincyugan mutu myan ksyugan han.
Once, twice, three times, everyone would lend him something.
我今天七點到學校。: 一次、兩次、三次，大家會借東西給他。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: ana ga kyan utux ya’ih na lhnyun nya, ksyuk ye’aya lga, ini nya psyugi may ye’aya hasa la.
But he has a bad habit of often borrowing things but not returning them.
我今天七點到學校。: 但是他有個壞習慣，經常借了東西卻不還。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: babaw nya, ini sami sogan pksyuk ye’aya ki hiya la.
In the end, no one wanted to borrow anything from him.
我今天七點到學校。: 最後大家都不想借他東西了。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: kyan utux ryax, mgluw sami kwara musa mgnaw tetanux.
One day, we all went on an outing together.
我今天七點到學校。: 有一天，我們大家一起去郊遊。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: mki sami ska tu’iy, nki musa mstanux ku Hayung, ana ga yengan nya maras rban i’ing.
On the way, Hayung wanted to go to the bathroom, but he forgot to bring toilet paper.
我今天七點到學校。: 路途中，Hayung想上廁所，但他忘記帶衛生紙。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: nki ksyuk sku mtna mkbaga biru, ana ga syukun naha kwara maha, ini kung aras uziy.
He borrowed toilet paper from his classmates, but everyone told him that I didn’t bring them either.
我今天七點到學校。: 他跟同學借衛生紙，可是大家都回他說，我也沒有帶耶。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: memaw khlan ku Hayung, ru mngilis minbci maha, huwa simu ini pksyuk kuzing rban i’ing!!
Hayung burst into tears. He said angrily, why don’t everyone lend me toilet paper!
我今天七點到學校。: Hayung急的哭了出來。他生氣的說，為什麼大家都不借我衛生紙!!

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: kyalun nku mtna mkbaga biru ku hiya, ye’igi, ini su aras nanak, ru pinksyuk myan isu ye’aya ga, ini su wahiy may la!
The classmate told him, because you didn’t bring it yourself, and you wouldn’t return the things lent to you!
我今天七點到學校。: 同學告訴他，因為你都不自己帶，而且借給你的東西，你都不會還!

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: kinsasan nya mgyebu, muwah miru ru tehuk pkba’an biru ku Hayang, wayan nya pbnahun may mtna mkbaga biru kwara ye’aya naha.
The next day at school, Hayung arrived at school early and returned everything he had borrowed from his classmates.
我今天七點到學校。: 隔天上學，Hayang很早就到學校了，Hayang把跟同學借的東西都還給同學們。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: mkura sku mgluw mkbaga biru ku Hayung, tmatuk tunux maha, babaw nya p’aras kung nanak ye’aya, mhuway simu uziy, pinksyuk ki hiya.
Hayung apologized to the students and said that he would definitely bring his own things in the future, and thanked the classmates for their willingness to lend him things before.
我今天七點到學校。: Hayung向同學們道歉，並說他以後一定會自己帶東西，也謝謝同學們之前願意借他東西。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: mki alang myan, yaba mu ga pyang ba ’mlyap s’uli.
My dad is a hunter of the tribe.
我今天七點到學校。: 我的爸爸是部落的獵人。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: la’i kung na ga, trang gbyan lga, yaba ru mama mutu maras puting ru patus musa tanux.
When I was little, my dad and uncle would go out at night with hunting knives and guns.
我今天七點到學校。: 我小的時候，爸爸和叔叔會在晚上出門，帶著獵刀和獵槍。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: sluwan lga, mutu niya maras sa ’sinu muwah sali.
At daybreak, they returned with their prey.
我今天七點到學校。: 天亮時，他們就會帶著獵到的獵物回來。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: kruma ga bewak nahi, kruma ga yapit, kya ruma uziy ga la’ung.
Sometimes it was a boar, sometimes a flying squirrel, and occasionally a pheasant.
我今天七點到學校。: 有時候是山豬、有時候是飛鼠，偶爾也會有雉雞。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: mutu mki sku kyupan alang ku laha, ’masu may ’sinu sku kwara utux alang.
They would divide the prey at the entrance of the village and share it with the tribe.
我今天七點到學校。: 他們會在村口將獵物分好，分享給族人。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: mutu kung mkebu yaba maha, pgluw kung isu musa ’mlyap.
Every time I quarreled with my father, I wanted to go hunting with my father.
我今天七點到學校。: 我每次都會吵著爸爸，要跟著爸爸去打獵。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: kmayan yaba maha, rahu su lga rasaw misu mluw kung la.
Dad said that he would take me with me when I grew up.
我今天七點到學校。: 爸爸說等我長大了他再帶我一起去。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: ttmalung na alang, mutu kbalay luyang tmiri ’sinu, mutu kbalay luyang ru wahiy.
The men of the tribe also trap their prey, making lasso traps and rock traps.
我今天七點到學校。: 部落的男人也會用陷阱抓獵物，他們會製作套索陷阱和石壓式陷阱。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: pyang ba kbalay luyang yaba mu, kmayan yaba maha, hani ga ttiri la’ung, siki nble’un ta tayux pilung na ’’sinu, wahiy ga siki syun sku tu’iy hkayan na ’’sinu.
My dad is very good at making lasso traps. Dad said that this is used to catch pheasants. We have to carefully observe the footprints of the prey, and the traps should be placed on the path of the prey.
我今天七點到學校。: 我的爸爸很會製作套索陷阱，爸爸說，這是用來捕抓雉雞的，我們要仔細觀察獵物的腳印，陷阱要放在獵物走的路上。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: ye’igi smogan kung helaw mgluw binkis musa ’mlyap, kbaga kung posa luyang krryax, yanga balay wayan tmiru ’sinu ku luyang mu la.
In order to go hunting with adults as soon as possible, I practiced making traps every day, and soon my traps can really catch prey.
我今天七點到學校。: 為了可以趕快和大人一起去打獵，我每天練習製作陷阱，很快地我的陷阱就真的可以抓到獵物了。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: txan ni yaba lru, kyalun kung nya maha, babaw nya musa su pyang ba trgyax.
Dad saw it and told me that I will be a very good hunter in the future.
我今天七點到學校。: 爸爸看到後對我說我以後一定會是很厲害的獵人。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: misu soni, niya kung rahu la, spanga mu ku boli ru tlak mu, gmluw yaba musa ’mlyap.
Now that I have grown up, I carry my bow and arrows and go hunting with my father.
我今天七點到學校。: 現在我長大了，我背起我的弓和箭矢，跟著爸爸一起去打獵。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: mbinah sami alang lga, s’asu myan ku tniri ’sinu ki kwara s’uli.
When returning to the village, share the hunted prey with the tribe.
我今天七點到學校。: 回村時將獵到的獵物和族人們分享。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: kmayan yaba maha, siki tmubun ta bbinkisan maha, mhuway simu may oyat, pyux tniri myan ’’sinu.
Dad said, we want to thank the ancestors for their blessings, so that we have a lot of prey to harvest.
我今天七點到學校。: 爸爸說，我們要感謝祖靈賜福，讓我們有很多獵物收穫。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: makasu’i kung tayhuk pakaba’an biru mayabu sawni la.
I was late for school this morning.
我今天七點到學校。: 我早上上學遲到了。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: musa kung i pakaba’an biru ga, yamngiya kung maras su kabang mu la.
When I was going to school, I forgot to bring my backpack.
我今天七點到學校。: 去學校的時候，我忘了帶書包。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: ini kung aras ninanu na yayuwaw.
I didn't bring anything with me.
我今天七點到學校。: 我什麼東西都沒有帶。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: miru sami ga, gamalu kung matayux biru ki bays mu miru.
During class, I and my classmates read the textbook together.
我今天七點到學校。: 上課的時候，我和同學一起看課本。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: pasapung ga, kasiyukan kung nya inpit ru i’ing ku galuw mu miru.
During the exam, a classmate lent me a pen and an eraser.
我今天七點到學校。: 考試的時候，同學借我筆和橡皮擦。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: kyalun kung ni pasaba biru maha, “sa’utux la ga kayabu hazi matuli, laxiy i kasu’i la ki!”
The teacher told me, Wake up earlier next time and don't be late again!""
我今天七點到學校。: 老師跟我說：「下次早點起床，不要再遲到了!」

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: rawin mu ga Kusaw hiya ga la’i na Tayan uziy.
My good friend’s name is Kusaw, and he is also an Tayal child.
我今天七點到學校。: 我的好朋友叫Kusaw，他也是泰雅族的小孩。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: magalu sami miru i alang Maypuwan.
We study together in the Maypuwan tribe.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們一起在象鼻部落讀書。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: mutu sami magaluw karariyax mung su yayuwaw sarari na yutas, ba sami kwara kamayan kayi na Tayan.
We often listen to the elders telling stories together, and we both can speak the Tayal proficiently.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們常常一起聽耆老說故事，我們都很會說泰雅語。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: babawi ru katahuy kung, Kusaw ga kahi ru rarawu uziy.
I am tall and overweight, while Kusaw is short and thin.
我今天七點到學校。: 我很高也很胖，Kusaw很矮也很瘦。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: haylaw ku Kusaw, balay naha kwara hiya.
Kusaw is very energetic, and everyone likes him a lot.
我今天七點到學校。: Kusaw很有活力，大家都很喜歡他。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: pagazinah ku pakaba’an biru sawni, payaux ku panawsa pakaba’an biru su pasapangan.
Today was the school's sports day, and the school organized many competitions.
我今天七點到學校。: 今天是學校的運動會，學校舉辦了許多競賽。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: kiyan hamuluy saniyuw, papay’un mariy, mazinzh ru pasapung bahawni.
There were tug of war, soccer, running, dancing, and archery.
我今天七點到學校。: 有拔河、足球、跑步、跳舞和射箭。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: psapung su mazinah kung hiya.
I participated in the running competition.
我今天七點到學校。: 我比賽跑步。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: mazinah kung ga, matakuy kung la, payux ramuyux ku tari mu.
When I was running, I fell down, and my knees were bleeding.
我今天七點到學校。: 當我跑步的時候，我跌倒了，膝蓋流了很多血。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: sikila ga matuli kung, musa kung tagalayng mazinah lawziy.
But I stood up and continued running forward.
我今天七點到學校。: 但我站起來，繼續向前跑。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: tayhuk kung i mumu’ tahakan ga pa’asun kwara na tayan.
Everyone was happy when I reached the finish line.
我今天七點到學校。: 我到終點時所有人都很開心。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: ana kung ini agan su icibang ga, sikila ga payang kung ma’as, ya’igi waya mu masu’un anuwah pasapung kani.
Although I didn't get first place, I'm glad because I completed the race.
我今天七點到學校。: 雖然沒有獲得第一名，但我很高興，因為我完成了比賽。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: kuzing ki yaba mu musa matisan ki mama mu su sahaysa.
Yesterday, my father and I visited my uncle.
我今天七點到學校。: 昨天我和爸爸去拜訪我的叔叔。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: mapakngih kuzih ni mama la.
My uncle injured his foot.
我今天七點到學校。: 叔叔的腳受傷了。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: kyalun sami niya， magali mabaka’ utux takayu ku ramu’iy sali.
He told us that there was a hole in the roof of his house.
我今天七點到學校。: 他告訴我們，房子的屋頂破了一個洞。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: tamapang saku ramu’iy sali kiya ga, kahun saku ramu’iy masahutaw ti hugan la.
He fell off the roof while repairing it.
我今天七點到學校。: 他在修理屋頂時，從屋頂摔下來了。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: maras su hi kating ru pinnang ku yaba bay niya mama.
My father brought beef and betel nuts for my uncle.
我今天七點到學校。: 爸爸帶了牛肉和檳榔給叔叔。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: matisan sami ti abiyan ki mama mu, payux pinyuwan niya su yayuwaw sarali.
My uncle and I chatted in the room, and he shared many stories.
我今天七點到學校。: 我和叔叔在房間裡聊天，他分享了很多故事。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: minhari su a’awsa mu ga, sapa’as kung ni mama mu maha babawi su la, ru waya hayuti ku inrakyasan su uziy la.
Before I left, my uncle praised me for growing taller and becoming more handsome.
我今天七點到學校。: 我要離開前，叔叔誇我長高了，也變得更帥氣了。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: maha kung, “naw mu su balay kuzih mama la ga, uwah matisan sali mu su sa’utux.”
I said, When your foot gets better
我今天七點到學校。: come to our house next time and visit us.""
https://web.klokah.tw/text/sound/34285/5: 我說：「等叔叔腳好了，下次也來我們家玩。」

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: maki su kayan ti 2022 (sazing siyan mapusan sazing kayan), kiya nakaygi Sefu ka minbunsyu Yencumin balay siyun baniru su lalu na Tayan la.
In 2022, the government announced that indigenous identification cards can include tribal names separately.
我今天七點到學校。: 在2022年，政府召開了原住民身分證可單列族名的會議。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: pinusan mu ku basiya masina ki Sefu sasiyan lalu Tayan ku minbunsyu ka sining alang Noami Kulas.
I interviewed Noami Kulas, a young tribal member who has long been advocating for the inclusion of tribal names on identification cards.
我今天七點到學校。: 我訪問了長期向政府爭取身分證「單列族名」的部落青年Noami Kulas。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: minkayan kung ki hiya masatana’a ta ti pahangi’an hani ga musa kung ma’ut ti sali niya.
We had arranged to visit his home this holiday for the interview.
我今天七點到學校。: 我和他約定好這個假日到他家訪問他。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: maki sa ma’ut hani ga, galuwnan kung niya pinayu’ ku inkahulan lalu niya, ru pasaba niya uziy ku mayanux si sali ki alang niya.
During the interview, he introduced to me the origin of his name and also introduced me to his family and tribe.
我今天七點到學校。: 在訪問的過程中，他向我介紹了他的名字的由來，也帶我認識了他的家人、他的部落。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: pa’usan mu hiya maha huwa su sapawzit sa’ayung ku a’iyu lalu hani, baniru su sarali ga ya’ih pi?
I asked him why he insisted on changing his name. Wasn’t the old registration method sufficient?
我今天七點到學校。: 我問他為什麼堅持要改名，舊的登記方式不好嗎?

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: sawun kung niya maha, ya’igi sakahun su lalu cyukuk ga ini niya patahakiy sa’ayung kakusa na lalu niya, mutu naha sawun maha 「那先生」, misa su mutu ya’ani ku sapasiya naha uziy ma.
He told me that using Chinese characters could not accurately convey his name, and others would still call him \Na Xian Sheng
我今天七點到學校。: \" which resulted in many jokes being made."
https://web.klokah.tw/text/sound/34285/5: 他對我說，因為用中文字並不能準確的傳達他的名字，其他人還會叫他「那先生」，也因此鬧出不少笑話。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: maha Noami Kulas, “baniru lalu su kayi na Yencumin hani ku payang ta lalu balay, niwan na inkahulan nakisan Atayan, ru utux sali nabakis, lalu nanak saxa’ mayanux hani ga, muwa na saluwan hmkani sabanahan nanak kwara lalu naha ki.”
Noami Kulas said, \The names written in indigenous languages are our true names. My name represents our ethnic group
我今天七點到學校。: our family
https://web.klokah.tw/text/sound/34285/5: our identity. I hope more fellow tribespeople can reclaim their own names.\""
column5: Noami Kulas說：「原住民語書寫的名字才是我們真正的名字。我的名字代表了我們的族群、我們的家族、我們的身分，希望能有更多族人找回自己的名字。」

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: gamalu kung ki yaki mu musa i pabakagan tabaziy su sahaysa, maras su pinnuhiy niya nanak na tabihiy ru sakalay niya su satalam nani’un kwara na Yencumin.
Yesterday, I went to the market with my grandmother to set up a stall. My grandmother brought a lot of vegetables that she grew herself and also prepared indigenous cuisine for everyone.
我今天七點到學校。: 昨天我跟奶奶去市集擺攤，奶奶帶了許多自己種的蔬菜去，也製作了原住民美食給大家。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: sabalay’an naha kwara ku tabanasan ni yaki, tiku tamayluh ru raki tumun payux tayan bamaziy ki, payux uziy ku muwah tamalam su tanahuk niya rami.
Everyone loved my grandmother’s stall. Many people bought the chilis and African eggplants, and many people came to taste the dishes she cooked.
我今天七點到學校。: 大家很喜歡奶奶的攤位，辣椒和車輪茄很多人買，許多人來品嘗她煮的菜餚。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: tiku tanahuk niya ka mala’ ru myux rahakay payang i balay ni’un, kiya utux ka anising niya su ma’aw ka hi na baywak nahiy, mimaw hamuluy su habayaw okyak ku sanawkang niya ma.
The ferns and sticky rice she cooked were delicious, as well as the braised pork with maqaw pepper and wild boar meat. The flavors attracted many customers, and everyone lined up at our stall.
我今天七點到學校。: 她煮的蕨菜和糯米飯非常好吃，還有用山豬肉煮的馬告滷肉，味道吸引了很多客人，大家都來我們攤位排隊。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: tamahuk rami ku yaki mu ga, mutu kung i tamapih su okyak, maki kung sasiyaw hamuwaw kung maha, “tabihiy ga nuhiy miyan nanak ki, kiyan na azi naya su hinbaka’an niya nanak, ihihazi uwah mabaziy yu!”
While my grandmother was cooking, I was on the side attracting customers. I shouted, \The vegetables are self-grown
我今天七點到學校。: all-natural and organic! Come and buy now!\""
https://web.klokah.tw/text/sound/34285/5: 奶奶煮東西的時候，我在旁邊招攬客人。我在一旁大喊著：「蔬菜都是自己種的，天然有機，趕快來買喔!」

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: ini kyanga masu’un tabaziy ku tabihiy miyan la, kamayan yaki maha, “ya’igi kiyan isu ramaw kwara ma.”
Our goods sold out quickly, and my grandmother said, \It’s all thanks to your help.\""
我今天七點到學校。: 我們的東西很快就賣完了，奶奶說：「都是因為有你的幫忙。」

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: tiku pintayuwaw hani ga, niya mu sakaba’an ku sawun sasiyup ka’amam na Yencumin ru ninanu kwara nani’un ka kinba naha, ru tinlaman mu la ku na’abuk tabanasan haniy.
Through this event, I learned about indigenous plants and food and experienced the hard work of running a stall.
我今天七點到學校。: 這個活動，我學到了有關原住民植物和食品的知識，並且體驗到了擺攤的辛苦。

mpitu tmuting mgyebu soni ga, tehuk kung: taxan mu ku anihun sanawgan su nani’un kwara rarami Tayan sarali ka lungan yaki mu ga, payang mu sapawsa su satarahu’ ru sapa’as lungan balay la.
Seeing my grandmother’s passion for traditional food, I feel very proud and honored.
我今天七點到學校。: 看到了奶奶對傳統食物的熱愛，我感到非常驕傲和榮幸。
